heroImage.title: Your Professional Profile
heroImage.description: Customize your profile, manage your data, and add your professional certifications to highlight your experience and knowledge for other users in the FitWise community.

certificateManagement.yearsOfExperienceValidation: Years of experience is required and must be more than 0
certificateManagement.deleteQuestion: Are you sure you want to delete the certificate
certificateManagement.certificateListFilter: Filter by State, Institution and Code

heroImage.title: Your Followers
heroImage.description: Here you can view and manage the profiles you follow. Discover their professional certifications and stay connected with other members of the FitWise community.

followedUsers.title: List of Followed Users
followedUsers.deleteDialogMessage: Are you sure you want to unfollow this user

followerForm.title: Follow User

followerForm.notFoundMessage: No user found with that email address.
followerForm.notYouMessage: You cannot follow your own profile.

followerForm.followedMessage: You are now following this user.
